verses.verse: Many times<WH7227> they have afflicted<WH6887> me from my youth<WH5271> up.<WH3478> Let Israel now say,<WH559>
many times<WH7227> they have afflicted<WH6887> me from my youth<WH5271> up,<WH3201> yet they have not prevailed against me.
The plowers<WH2790> plowed<WH2790> on my back.<WH1354> They made their furrows<WH4618> long.<WH748>
Yahweh<WH3068> is righteous.<WH6662> He has cut apart<WH7112> the cords<WH5688> of the wicked.<WH7563>
Let them be disappointed<WH954> and turned<WH5472> backward,<WH268> all those who hate<WH8130> Zion.<WH6726>
Let them be as the grass<WH2682> on the housetops,<WH1406> which withers<WH3001> before<WH6927> it grows up;<WH8025>
with which the reaper<WH7114> doesn't<WH4390> fill his hand,<WH3709> nor he who binds sheaves,<WH6014> his bosom.<WH2683>
Neither do those who go by<WH5674> say,<WH559> "The blessing<WH1293> of Yahweh<WH3068> be on you.<WH1288> We bless you in the name<WH8034> of Yahweh.<WH3068>"
